thig15.1:11.1: upaṭṭhahitvā → uṭṭhahitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr); upaṭṭhahituṃ (?)

thig15.1:22.2: paṭiccharayi → paṭicchasi (bj); paṭicchati (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed);
